panel_content.text:
Available commands:
- /init [context] - Analyze codebase and create OLLAMA.md
  Example: /init this is a web API project using FastAPI
- /init --force   - Overwrite existing OLLAMA.md
- /auto           - Toggle auto-continue mode for tasks
- /tasks          - Show current task progress
- /tools          - Show available MCP tools
- /prompts        - List available code prompts
- /prompt <name>  - Load a specific prompt
- /help           - Show this help
- quit            - Exit the program

Start with --resume to continue a previous conversation

Just type your request in natural language!
Examples:
- "Write a Python script to scrape a website"
- "Create a web GUI that connects to Ollama"
- "Help me debug this code"
panel_content.//: Full help text displayed with /help command
